description: Dashboard for when you are using multiple Jenkins Masters

panels.description: The ratio of ok (200) request out of all requests.
panels.title: Good HTTP Request Ratio

panels.description:
How long the health check takes to complete at the 99th percentile.
Higher numbers signify problems
panels.title: Health Check Duration (99%)

panels.description: The 99% percentile of HTTP Requests handled by Jenkins masters.
panels.title: HTTP Request Duration (99%)

panels.description: Shows performance of Ingress Controller connection that lasts longer than 250 milliseconds
panels.title: Ingress Perfomance

panels.description: Amount of Masters healthy
panels.title: Number of Masters

panels.description: Dropwizard based Health Score derived from other metrics

panels.description: Amount of Jobs Currenty in the Queue

panels.description: Uptime in hours
